page.title: 18MY HOME BY A VILLAGE CHILD
page.content:
My home is a chalet bungalow in Shepherds Way.I have 4 people in my family.My Dad is the oldest.It is a big bungalow.We have 3 bedrooms,a dining room,a sitting room,a kitchen, a bathroom and a toilet.We have a garage and a brown car. We have a back and front garden.The front door is orange and the back is white.We have 3 pets;a rabbit called Smutty;a fish called Fred and a dog called Bones. My brother is 5 years old.His name is Simon.My Dad works at Purbeck School He is a Deputy Head and a PE teacher. My Mum works at Sandford Middle School She is a First Year teacher.My brother and I go to West Lulworth First School.
David ( Age 8)
